name: Smobi
headline: Bringing In-App experiences to SMS
description: Smobi is an AI powered conversational marketing platform that helps e-commerce brands increase sales and improve their customer relationships via interactive SMS messages.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:e-commerce; industry:marketing; industry:sms; location:new-york

founders.name: Kunal Puri, Founder
founders.description: Building Smobi - data for SMB acquisitions. Formerly an engineer at Amazon where I worked on large-scale notification delivery systems for Amazon Advertising.

founders.name: Michael Ning, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CTO @ Smobi (YC S23), a business for sale marketplace with verified buyer and listing data.

Formerly Dover (YC S19)

Connect your Shopify store and start creating engaging mobile campaigns that can increase your conversion rates by up to 47% compared to regular SMS campaigns

## Stop wasting money with regular SMS campaigns
Create beautiful and interactive e-commerce experiences to increase conversion and reduce message clutter
### Manual or automated campaigns
Build manual or automated campaigns that target specific segments of your users based on Shopify.
![Manual and automated campaigns connected to Shopify](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4ZxM4feQyeTtbBkVvoyRlQ6gU5Y.png)
![Manual and automated campaigns connected to Shopify](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4ZxM4feQyeTtbBkVvoyRlQ6gU5Y.png)
### From draft to launch in minutes
Use pre-built messaging templates to kickstart your campaign in minutes.
![Templates used in a mobile device](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jfwwbLXcmpZy6AXj7PWKRt9Jo.png)
![Templates used in a mobile device](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jfwwbLXcmpZy6AXj7PWKRt9Jo.png)

### Customization for your brand
Customize your RCS message and agent to align with your brand guidelines, creating a trustworthy appearance for your audience.
![Brand customization with Smobi](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tYaCmTZesMzbFrmi4Br3OqWaXOY.png)
### In-depth insights and reports
Get detailed reports on your campaigns and the appropriate ROI for RCS compared to SMS campaigns.
![Anual Report for a business company](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HHbcstNOU6Dh0u1RQIBPrhqoI.png)
### Get A Live Demo Now
Put in your phone number and a shopify store URL and see example RCS messages in action!

## Case studies
Companies that have increased their results using RCS messaging
### Picard
Picard, a premium frozen food retailer, used RCS messaging as a crucial part of its holiday engagement strategy. 
**Increase in redirections**
The RCS format generated over 10% than Rich SMS. 
**Higher engagement**
Customer engagement 42% higher. 
**Increase in redirections**
3X higher click-through rate than Rich SMS. 
![Man buying food at a frozen food retailer](https://framerusercontent.com/images/641cpwudpfZgwOZdUdkPGHxMyY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WIMZVYDuQfquzMtJ5CxPSZJyuqM.png)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rFtrhSrRfWCSw7RuS65fyRUFYzg.svg)
### Micromania-Zing
Micromania-Zing, a major video game retail company, used RCS as part of its omnichannel marketing strategy to support its customers with their Christmas purchases. 
**More calls to action**
RCS offered up to four calls to action for use in redirecting clients to different categories in its campaigns. 
**Higher click rate**
7x higher click rate than Rich SMS. 
**Improved visibility**
86% higher read rate than newsletters. 
### BUT
BUT, a leading home furnishing retailer in France, used several different messaging channels to seamlessly connect with customers, strategically growing their WhatsApp opt-in base with RCS. 
**Through-the-roof CTR**
Their RCS campaign boasted a click-through-rate of 20%. 
**Fully scalable**
BUT used RCS to send over 20 campaigns to over five million contacts. 
**Successful omnichannel strategy**
Using these channels to the best of their abilities, BUT increased its WhatsApp customer base by 123%!

## Frequently Asked Questions
Some of the most common questions from our customers 
Some of the most common questions from our customers 
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * Does this work with every carrier?
Yes, Smobi’s RCS messaging works with almost all carriers in the United States, including AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, Metro by T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, Cricket, Spectrum, TracFone, Straight Talk, Xfinity Mobile, C Spire, Consumer Cellular, FirstNet, PureTalk, Red Pocket, and Visible. Mint and Boost Mobile are currently developing RCS capabilities

  * Is Smobi secure?
Yes. We prioritize your security by implementing industry-standard encryption and following best practices to protect your data. Additionally, we are in the process of achieving SOC 2 Type II compliance to ensure the highest level of data security and privacy for our clients.
  * Is Smobi secure?
Yes. We prioritize your security by implementing industry-standard encryption and following best practices to protect your data. Additionally, we are in the process of achieving SOC 2 Type II compliance to ensure the highest level of data security and privacy for our clients.

Yes. We prioritize your security by implementing industry-standard encryption and following best practices to protect your data. Additionally, we are in the process of achieving SOC 2 Type II compliance to ensure the highest level of data security and privacy for our clients.
  * What devices support RCS messaging?
RCS messaging is supported on all Android devices and will soon be supported on any iPhone running iOS 18. This means that around 2.5 billion people worldwide will soon have access to RCS messaging.
  * What devices support RCS messaging?
RCS messaging is supported on all Android devices and will soon be supported on any iPhone running iOS 18. This means that around 2.5 billion people worldwide will soon have access to RCS messaging.
  * What devices support RCS messaging?
RCS messaging is supported on all Android devices and will soon be supported on any iPhone running iOS 18. This means that around 2.5 billion people worldwide will soon have access to RCS messaging.
  * Does Smobi provide engagement analytics for businesses?
Yes, Smobi offers comprehensive engagement analytics for businesses. Our platform provides insights into message delivery, engagement rates, customer interactions, and more, allowing you to optimize your marketing strategies effectively.

## Case studies
Companies that have increased their results using RCS messaging
### Picard
Picard, a premium frozen food retailer, used RCS messaging as a crucial part of its holiday engagement strategy. 
**Increase in redirections**
The RCS format generated over 10% than Rich SMS. 
**Higher engagement**
Customer engagement 42% higher. 
**Increase in redirections**
3X higher click-through rate than Rich SMS. 
![Man buying food at a frozen food retailer⟨16⟩]

### Micromania-Zing
Micromania-Zing, a major video game retail company, used RCS as part of its omnichannel marketing strategy to support its customers with their Christmas purchases. 
**More calls to action**
RCS offered up to four calls to action for use in redirecting clients to different categories in its campaigns. 
**Higher click rate**
7x higher click rate than Rich SMS. 
**Improved visibility**
86% higher read rate than newsletters. 
### BUT
BUT, a leading home furnishing retailer in France, used several different messaging channels to seamlessly connect with customers, strategically growing their WhatsApp opt-in base with RCS. 
**Through-the-roof CTR**
Their RCS campaign boasted a click-through-rate of 20%. 
**Fully scalable**
BUT used RCS to send over 20 campaigns to over five million contacts. 
**Successful omnichannel strategy**
Using these channels to the best of their abilities, BUT increased its WhatsApp customer base by 123%!

## Frequently Asked Questions
Some of the most common questions from our customers 
Some of the most common questions from our customers 
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * What is Smobi?
Smobi is an AI-powered SMS marketing platform designed to help e-commerce brands modernize their customer communications. We provide in-app SMS experiences and rich customer support to create more engaging interactions with your customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * How does interactive RCS messaging work?
Interactive RCS (Rich Communication Services) messaging enhances traditional SMS by offering a richer, more interactive experience. It allows for features like high-resolution images, videos, read receipts, typing indicators, and interactive buttons—all within the native messaging app. RCS is poised to replace SMS as the standard for text messaging, providing businesses with a more engaging way to communicate with customers.
  * Does this work with every carrier?
Yes, Smobi’s RCS messaging works with almost all carriers in the United States, including AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, Metro by T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, Cricket, Spectrum, TracFone, Straight Talk, Xfinity Mobile, C Spire, Consumer Cellular, FirstNet, PureTalk, Red Pocket, and Visible. Mint and Boost Mobile are currently developing RCS capabilities

generated_description:
Smobi is a fresh entrant in the e-commerce space, established in 2023 as part of the Y Combinator S23 cohort. Based in New York, this compact team of three is on a mission to transform customer interactions through SMS by integrating rich, in-app experiences. In essence, they aim to redefine how businesses communicate with customers, making it more engaging and effective.

At its core, Smobi leverages AI to deliver a robust conversational marketing platform tailored for e-commerce brands. The platform specializes in utilizing interactive SMS messages that not only enhance customer engagement but also significantly boost sales—reportedly increasing revenue by over 115% through dynamic campaigns. This isn't just about sending texts; it's about crafting rich customer experiences that feel personal and interactive.

Smobi's technology revolves around RCS (Rich Communication Services), which steps up traditional SMS by offering features like images, videos, and interactive buttons—all embedded within the familiar messaging app. Think of it as SMS 2.0, ideal for businesses wanting to stand out in a cluttered text message landscape.

Their platform is designed with ease of use in mind, seamlessly integrating with Shopify to help businesses create both manual and automated campaigns. Smobi provides a variety of templates aimed at simplifying campaign creation, allowing brands to launch campaigns quickly and measure the response through detailed analytics.

Backed by influential partners like Dalton Caldwell from Y Combinator, Smobi is gaining traction, with over 12,000 businesses already utilizing their platform to enhance communication and increase sales.

If you're a brand looking to innovate your customer engagement strategy, connecting your Shopify store with Smobi could be a game-changer. They offer customizable solutions, spam protection, and extensive analytics to refine marketing strategies continually. In a world where customer experience is king, Smobi is the partner that can help you amplify your messaging efforts effectively. 

For more details, you can explore their offerings at [Smobi's website](https://smobi.com).
